title: Her Friend Is Marrying An Abuser And Wants Her To Be The Maid Of Honor
description:
Scenario, you think a friend of yours is going to ask you to be in their wedding and because you don’t approve of their fiancé you really don’t want to. What do you do?
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
